room_title: Escape room "The Facility" by Escape Room BCS in College Station
room_address: 907 Harvey Rd Ste B College Station, TX 77840
room_description:
You arrive at a secret location for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity; a conference held by the critically acclaimed, Dr. Andrews. Although his work is widely known throughout research circles, he has remained secluded for years. Away from public view, Dr. Andrews has gone mad, creating first animal and then human tests that gone disastrously, and terrifyingly, wrong.
He has brought you here unwittingly for his final experiment. You have one hour to escape his maze of tricks and games before he returns and takes his wrath on you!
